articles.description: Another strange thing about 2020: Planet acceleration. The speed of the planet's rotation often drifts slightly, depending on changes in winds, ocean
articles.content:
Another strange thing about 2020: Planet acceleration.
The speed of the planet’s rotation often drifts slightly, depending on changes in winds, ocean currents, or rolls around Earth’s molten core. B… [+1082 chars]

articles.author: TASS
articles.title: Russia plans to send mission to Venus - TASS
articles.description: Projects of Venus missions are included in the united government program of Russia’s space exploration for 2021-2030
articles.content: MOSCOW, September 15. /TASS/. Russia plans to send its own mission to Venus in addition to the planned joint mission with the USA "Venera-D," head of Russian space corporation Roscosmos Dmitry Rogozi… [+916 chars]
